kickstart.post:
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/.gnu/atlas /bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/.intel/atlas /bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/.pgi/atlas
#%Module1.0 module-whatis "atlas" module-whatis "Version: 3.9.45" module-whatis "Description: atlas" module-whatis "Compiler: gnu" set atlasHome /opt/atlas/3.9.45/gnu setenv ATLASHOME $atlasHome prepend-path PATH $atlasHome/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH $atlasHome/lib prepend-path LIBPATH $atlasHome/lib
#%Module1.0 module-whatis "atlas" module-whatis "Version: 3.9.45" module-whatis "Description: atlas" module-whatis "Compiler: intel" set atlasHome /opt/atlas/3.9.45/intel setenv ATLASHOME $atlasHome prepend-path PATH $atlasHome/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH $atlasHome/lib prepend-path LIBPATH $atlasHome/lib
#%Module1.0 module-whatis "atlas" module-whatis "Version: 3.9.45" module-whatis "Description: atlas" module-whatis "Compiler: pgi" set atlasHome /opt/atlas/3.9.45/pgi setenv ATLASHOME $atlasHome prepend-path PATH $atlasHome/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH $atlasHome/lib prepend-path LIBPATH $atlasHome/lib
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "3.9.45"
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "3.9.45"
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "3.9.45"
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/.gnu/atlas/.version.3.9.45 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/.gnu/atlas/.version /bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/.intel/atlas/.version.3.9.45 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/.intel/atlas/.version /bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/.pgi/atlas/.version.3.9.45 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/.pgi/atlas/.version
